title: Information Literacy Competency Enhancement Program for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: A long-term customized training program for in-service elementary school teachers to enhance their ability to utilize information for language education material development and lesson design

learning_goals: Learners develop the ability to systematically search for and evaluate academic materials in educational online databases
Learners apply information reprocessing techniques that comply with copyright and citation regulations in digital environments
Learners accurately identify reliable Open Educational Resources (OER) required for language education material development with over 80% precision
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
